inclusion.criterion: Age and sex matched group of patients with HCV- related liver cirrhosis who didn't develop HCC after DAAs therapy within one year follow up
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who refuse to participate in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with hepatitis B virus, any other causes of cirrhosis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on treatment. No evidence of alcoholic liver disease or other causes of cirrhosis.
